definition: to treat/treatment
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to stay
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect

sentences.english: He always optimistic and genially treats the others.
sentences.chinese: 他總是樂觀的，並且和善地對待別人。

sentences.english: Knowing your own darkness is the most prhvacticing way for deinging with the darknesses of other people.
sentences.chinese: 理解自身的暗淡，是對待他人暗淡一面的最好方法。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件類型，如變化或中間步驟，被區別對待。

sentences.english: If you want your blog to make money, treat it like a business.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想用你的博客來賺錢，就像經商一樣對待它吧。

sentences.english: They treated their servants well, but expected them always to know their place.
sentences.chinese: 他們對待僕人不壞，但期望他們時時安分守己。

sentences.english: Tommy said that he was dehumanized by his teachers, psychiatrists, and social workers.
sentences.chinese: 托米說他受到老師，精神病專家和社工的非人道對待。

sentences.english: "Mistakes are being made with regard to Mido, " added the representative.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬俱樂部在對待米多的問題上犯了不少錯誤。

sentences.english: Eg . If you go on ill-treating your wife like this , you will be taken to court .
sentences.chinese: 如果你再這樣對待你的妻子，你就會被送上法庭。

sentences.english: We need to have a happy medium between being too close and too distant to our friends.
sentences.chinese: 對待朋友應在過分親近與過分疏遠中，選擇中庸之道。

sentences.english: But how are we treating people with dementia?
sentences.chinese: 但我們應該怎樣對待老年癡呆病人？

sentences.english: She blushed when we criticized he for incorrect attitude to ward labour.
sentences.chinese: 當我們批評她對待勞動的不正確態度時，她臉紅了。

sentences.english: Suqin's heart was broken seeing that his family treated him like this.
sentences.chinese: 蘇秦看到家人這樣對待他，十分傷心。

sentences.english: Teach your child to be kind to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 教育你的孩子友好的對待地球。

sentences.english: That was a small thing but told me that I need to be serious to one thing.
sentences.chinese: 這件小事情，告訴我，我必須嚴素的對待每一件事。

sentences.english: Calmly all, because you know the answer sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 平常心對待一切，因爲你早晚會知道答案。

sentences.english: In addition, there have been concerns over how the council deals with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有人對人權理事會如何對待以色列表示關切。

regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
same/equal/equivalent
to refuse/to decline/to reject
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
to admit (to membership)
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
